MAC SUPPORT APP

MAC GURUS APP


Have you ever been in a position where you had a problem and needed help immediately? Tired of searching for hours for support? Try our new Support App! Its your own stop shop for reaching Mac Gurus LLC, Scheduling Appointments and opening trouble tickets.

The Mac Support App is a small App, created to share quick tips with Mac novices to help them learn some Mac tricks. People can contact me directly from the App where I offer most of my services free of charge.

Many services offered on a pro-bono basis, for non profits and other organizations that qualify.

Download Mac Gurus App




MAC GURUS HELPDESK


Have a question or issue? Need support? File a trouble ticket here for fast and quick support from our team of Mac Gurus!


MAC GURUS SCHEDULING


Ready to schedule an appointment? We offer free 1 hour consultations to let you know how we can better serve you and your company.
Regardless of your needs you can schedule a house call, consult or a phone chat here!




MAC GURUS REMOTE SUPPORT / CLIENT LOGIN


For those who have scheduled remote support services use the following app to start the remote support session. This allows us to remotely access your Mac via a secure code. Download the app and send the code to us to start.

Download Deskroll Remote Support App
